Class VertexContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiralabra.VertexContainer

  • public class VertexContainer
extends Object
    Contains all vertices and points created in the program.
    Author:
    Pavel

      • addVertex

        public Vertex addVertex(double x,
               double y)
        Creates a vertex at a specified position.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate where vertex is created.
        y - Y coordinate where vertex is created.
        Returns:
        pointer to the newly created vertex.

      • addPoint

        public Point addPoint(double x,
             double y)
        Creates a point at a specified position.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate where point is created.
        y - Y coordinate where point is created.
        Returns:
        pointer to the newly created point.

      • removeVertex

        public void removeVertex(Vertex vertex)
        Removes a vertex or point.
        Parameters:
        vertex - vertex or point that will get removed.

      • toggleEdge

        public void toggleEdge(Vertex v1,
              Vertex v2)
        Joins specified two vertices in a graph if there is no connection between them. Removes the connection if it exists prior.
        Parameters:
        v1 - certain vertex or point
        v2 - certain vertex or point

      • buildGraph

        public void buildGraph()
        Rebuilds a graph for all the existing vertices. All vertices are joined with other vertices if the joining edge isn't obstructed.

      • setShapeMode

        public void setShapeMode(Point begin,
                boolean wall)
        Configures polygon to act as a wall or non-wall.
        Parameters:
        begin - Any point in the polygon, from which all other points in the polygon will be accessed.
        wall - if true, polygon is configured as a wall. Otherwise non-wall.

      • shapeIsWall

        public boolean shapeIsWall(Point begin)
        Checks if a polygon acts like a wall.
        Parameters:
        begin - Any point in the polygon, from which all other points in the polygon will be accessed.
        Returns:
        true if a polygon acts like a wall.

      • invertShape

        public void invertShape(Point begin)
        Inverts all angles in a polygon. Sets a new angle for all corners in a polygon from a to 360 - a, where a is the value of an angle in degrees.
        Parameters:
        begin - Any point in the polygon, from which all other points in the polygon will be accessed.
